title: New Nielsen study on streaming points to more bad news for traditional TV
text: New Nielsen study on streaming points to more bad news for traditional TV Monday, 21 September 2015 (19 minutes ago) New Nielsen data reports that broadband-only homes are on the rise, while pay-TV subscriber numbers continue to drop, suggesting that consumers continue the shift to streaming services like Netflix, Amazon, and others. Global warming in the Arctic means earlier and more plentiful mosquitoes in Greenland, and that's bad news for the country's already shrinking caribou... Newser 2 days ago - Science Warming temperatures in the Arctic are causing mosquitoes to show up earlier and spread faster, according to a new study published in the Proceedings of the...
